headline: A Provocateur Puts Suicide Onstage
abstract: Milo Rau’s latest work is inspired by a French family whose members took their own lives.
lead_paragraph: GHENT, Belgium — The NTGent theater here was out of step with its surroundings last weekend. As the bustling, family-friendly Christmas market of this handsome port city was still going strong, with craft and jewelry stalls half framing the theater’s doors, inside a somber audience gathered for a new stage production about a family’s collective suicide.
